approve.description: Allows `guy` to spend `wad` on behalf of the caller.

transfer.description: Transfers `wad` amount of tokens to the `dst` address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `wad` amount of tokens from `src` to `dst` on behalf of `src`.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that `guy` is allowed to spend on behalf of `src`.

Approval.description: Emitted when `guy` is approved to spend `wad` on behalf of `src`.

Transfer.description: Emitted when `wad` amount is transferred from `src` to `dst`.

Deposit.description: Emitted when Ether is deposited into the contract.

Withdrawal.description: Emitted when Ether is withdrawn from the contract.
